attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not uncommon to see chip and baker vans outside schools at break and lunch times, as well as fast food and other retailers within an easy 1 minute walk from school.

All food outlets should be banned within a one mile radius of schools. If this is not seen as practical, then they should be restricted from selling to school children within school hours (this includes a hour before and after school)

This would force children to either eat school meals and snacks; or bring in their own, hopefully healthy food.
